an10.17:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an10.17:1.6: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu,
an10.17:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
an10.17:2.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti …pe… ditthiya suppatividdha,
an10.17:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto hoti kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko.
an10.17:3.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto hoti kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko,
an10.17:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvaco hoti sovacassakaranehi dhammehi samannagato, khamo padakkhinaggahi anusasanim.
an10.17:4.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvaco hoti …pe… anusasanim,
an10.17:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yani tani sabrahmacarinam uccavacani kinkaraniyani, tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupayaya vimamsaya samannagato, alam katum alam samvidhatum.
an10.17:5.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yani tani sabrahmacarinam …pe… alam katum alam samvidhatum,
an10.17:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammakamo hoti piyasamudaharo, abhidhamme abhivinaye ularapamojjo.
an10.17:6.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammakamo hoti piyasamudaharo, abhidhamme abhivinaye ularapamojjo,
an10.17:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an10.17:7.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu,
an10.17:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santuttho hoti itaritaracivarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharena.
an10.17:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satima hoti paramena satinepakkena samannagato cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussarita.
an10.17:9.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satima hoti paramena satinepakkena samannagato cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussarita,
an10.17:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an10.17:10.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya,
an10.17:11.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa nathakarana dhamma”ti.
